text.1: and heavenly floods firstborn by holy order exclaimed against the outrage on a brahman.
text.2: king soma first of all without reluctance made restitution of the brahmans consort.
text.3: mitra and varuṇa were the inviters agni as hota took her hand and led her.
text.4: the man her pledge must by her hand be taken when they have cried she is a brahmans consort.
text.5: she stayed not for a herald to conduct her thus is the kingdom of a ruler guarded.
text.6: thus spake of her those gods of old seven Ṛṣis who sate them down to their austere devotion.
text.7: dire is a brahmans wife led home by others in the supremest heaven she plants confusion.
text.8: the brahmacari goes engaged in duty he is a member of the gods own body.
text.9: through him bṛhaspati obtained his consort as the gods gained the ladle brought by soma.
text.10: so then the gods restored her so men gave the woman back again.
text.11: the kings who kept their promises restored the brahmans wedded wife.
text.12: having restored the brahmans wife and freed them with gods aid from sin.
text.13: they shared the fulness of the earth and won themselves extended sway.
